title: Are Tantrums Normal?
author: podcast@goodinside.com (Dr. Becky)
itunes:title: Are Tantrums Normal?
itunes:author: Dr. Becky
itunes:summary:
Tantrums are normal. Dr. Becky would even argue they’re healthy. In the moment, of course, tantrums feel awful, exhausting, and inconvenient.  In this episode, Dr. Becky answers three parents’ questions about navigating tantrums and teaches strategies to help you feel more equipped and in control.

Join Good Inside Membership: https://bit.ly/3cqgG2A 
Follow Dr. Becky on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/drbeckyatgoodinside 
Sign up for our weekly email, Good Insider: https://www.goodinside.com/newsletter 
Pre-order Dr. Becky's upcoming book, Good Inside: A Guide to Becoming the Parent You Want to Be: www.goodinside.com/book or wherever you order your books.
